bike.description: Alpha Gold Aluminum, butted & hydroformed tubing, cold-forged dropouts & bottom bracket, G2 Geometry, sliding vertical dropouts

components.description: Formula DC20 alloy front hub, KT TB5R SS disc alloy rear hub; Bontrager AT-850 disc 29 32-hole rims
Wellgo ATB, boron axle, alloy cage
Bontrager Low Riser, 25.4mm, 5mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Tektro Novela mechanical disc brakes, 6-bolt, 160mm rotors
